description.value:
Human culture is defined by its curiosity and love of novelty. As such, its members vary widely, adopting new practices more frequently than those of other cultures often do.

Weapon Training. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.gIT1rN4uekUCffGy]{Weapon Training} You gain proficiency with shortswords, longswords, light crossbows, and heavy crossbows.

Human Versatility. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.ZRYMkFc8fcDC8JSG]{Human Versatility} You gain proficiency with one additional skill of your choice and one additional tool of your choice.

Human Resilience. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.L7kzqOrHf53h4HJC]{Human Resilience} You gain proficiency with one of the following saving throws of your choice: Strength, Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and two extra languages of your choice. Human communities typically learn the languages that its members brought from their own heritages.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
